{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=EA4500 |revision=v1 (Cisco) |upc=320127559299 |asin=B007IL7AKM,B00DMM0O3Q |est_release_date=04/04/2012 |fcc_date=02/02/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model=RG-WM04.0 |manuf_rev=GA |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-EA4500 |ic_id=3839A-EA4500 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6282 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR-BC |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS1G63EFR-S6C |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, unpopulated,, (115200,8,N,1),, J5 |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8366 |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8063 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi2_chip1_model=88W8366 |wi2_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi2_chip2_model=88W8063 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6171R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2598L;SiGe, 2598L, 144ED;3;,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2567L;SiGe, 2567L, 144ED;3;,,, 2A, 2V non-synchronous Buck Converter;Texas Instruments;TPS54231;;1;,,, 4.5V/18V Synchronous Step-Down Three Buck Switcher;Texas Instruments;TPS65251;;1;,,, 4.5V/18V Synchronous Step-Down Buck Switcher;Texas Instruments;TPS54325;;1;,,, Precision Timer;Texas Instruments;NA555;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.5.9; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.35.8;; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt (unofficially), Debian, IPFire |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=LinksysXXXXX, LinksysXXXXX_5GHz |default_ssid_regex=^Linksys[0-9]{5}$, ^Linksys[0-9]{5}_5Ghz$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=20:AA:4B,C8:D7:19,58:6D:8F |oui_eth=20:AA:4B,C8:D7:19,58:6D:8F }} {{TagLine|Dual-Band N900 Router with Gigabit and USB}} :â€¢ {{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA4500/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA4500}} *[http://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=156189 Product comparison chart between EA4500 v1 and EA4500 v3]
"48RGWM04.0GA" and "Manufactured for CISCO" are silkscreened on the board. :Manufacturer changed to [[Wistron NeWeb]] instead of [[CyberTAN]].
{{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_EA4500}} :[http://certifications.wi-fi.org/pdf_certificate.php?cid=WFA13837 Wi-Fi Certified]
===Hardware=== The hardware appears to be identical to the [[Linksys E4200 v2]]. :The processor has the following on it.. *MRVL *F6W01 *A1E TW *1151AA *C120
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r26998074-Wireless-Linksys-EA4500-router- On '''DSLReports'''] (high-res internal shots on page 3) :[http://smg.photobucket.com/albums/v206/charlie22911/linksys%20ea4500/ Images on '''Photobucket'''] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=152372 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] :[http://git.chromium.org/gitweb/?p=chromiumos/third_party/autotest.git;a=blob;f=server/cros/chaos_static_ap_list.conf;h=96ffe88e6ec025cb32eabb71d13ca12b0b0feb39;hb=dcaefdda36ec9e3c281d70ccabb2ec900efce1a7 OUI: 20:AA:4B]
